00053 #define MCPWM_CHANNEL_EDGE_MODE                 ((uint32_t)(0))
00054 
00055 #define MCPWM_CHANNEL_CENTER_MODE               ((uint32_t)(1))

00060 #define MCPWM_CHANNEL_PASSIVE_HI                ((uint32_t)(1))

00062 /* Output Patent in 3-phase DC mode, the internal MCOA0 signal is routed to any or all of
00063  * the six output pins under the control of the bits in this register */
00064 #define MCPWM_PATENT_A0         ((uint32_t)(1<<0))      
00065 #define MCPWM_PATENT_B0         ((uint32_t)(1<<1))      
00066 #define MCPWM_PATENT_A1         ((uint32_t)(1<<2))      
00067 #define MCPWM_PATENT_B1         ((uint32_t)(1<<3))      
00068 #define MCPWM_PATENT_A2         ((uint32_t)(1<<4))      
00069 #define MCPWM_PATENT_B2         ((uint32_t)(1<<5))

00074 
00075 #define MCPWM_INTFLAG_MAT0      MCPWM_INT_IMAT(0)
00076

00100 /* Private Macros ------------------------------------------------------------- */
00105 /*********************************************************************/
00108 /* MCPWM Control register, these macro definitions below can be applied for these
00109  * register type:
00110  * - MCPWM Control read address
00111  * - MCPWM Control set address
00112  * - MCPWM Control clear address
00113  */
00114 #define MCPWM_CON_RUN(n)                ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*8)+0))) : (0))             
00115 #define MCPWM_CON_CENTER(n)             ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*8)+1))) : (0))             
00116 #define MCPWM_CON_POLAR(n)              ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*8)+2))) : (0))             
00117 #define MCPWM_CON_DTE(n)                ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*8)+3))) : (0))             
00118 #define MCPWM_CON_DISUP(n)              ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*8)+4))) : (0))             
00119 #define MCPWM_CON_INVBDC                ((uint32_t)(1<<29))                                                                             
00120 #define MCPWM_CON_ACMODE                ((uint32_t)(1<<30))                                                                             
00121 #define MCPWM_CON_DCMODE                ((uint32_t)(1<<31))                                                                             
00123 /*********************************************************************/
00126 /* Capture Control register, these macro definitions below can be applied for these
00127  * register type:
00128  * - MCPWM Capture Control read address
00129  * - MCPWM Capture Control set address
00130  * - MCPWM Capture control clear address
00131  */
00132 
00133 #define MCPWM_CAPCON_CAPMCI_RE(cap,mci) (((cap<=2)&&(mci<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((cap*6)+(mci*2)+0))) : (0))
00134 
00135 #define MCPWM_CAPCON_CAPMCI_FE(cap,mci) (((cap<=2)&&(mci<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((cap*6)+(mci*2)+1))) : (0))
00136 
00137 #define MCPWM_CAPCON_RT(n)                              ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<(18+(n)))) : (0))
00138 
00139 #define MCPWM_CAPCON_HNFCAP(n)                  ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<(21+(n)))) : (0))
00140 
00141 /*********************************************************************/
00144 /* Interrupt registers, these macro definitions below can be applied for these
00145  * register type:
00146  * - MCPWM Interrupt Enable read address
00147  * - MCPWM Interrupt Enable set address
00148  * - MCPWM Interrupt Enable clear address
00149  * - MCPWM Interrupt Flags read address
00150  * - MCPWM Interrupt Flags set address
00151  * - MCPWM Interrupt Flags clear address
00152  */
00154 #define MCPWM_INT_ILIM(n)       (((n>=0)&&(n<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*4)+0))) : (0))
00155 
00156 #define MCPWM_INT_IMAT(n)       (((n>=0)&&(n<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*4)+1))) : (0))
00157 
00158 #define MCPWM_INT_ICAP(n)       (((n>=0)&&(n<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((n*4)+2))) : (0))
00159 
00160 #define MCPWM_INT_ABORT         ((uint32_t)(1<<15))
00161 
00162 /*********************************************************************/
00165 /* MCPWM Count Control register, these macro definitions below can be applied for these
00166  * register type:
00167  * - MCPWM Count Control read address
00168  * - MCPWM Count Control set address
00169  * - MCPWM Count Control clear address
00170  */
00172 #define MCPWM_CNTCON_TCMCI_RE(tc,mci)   (((tc>=0)&&(tc<=2)&&(mci>=0)&&(mci<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((6*tc)+(2*mci)+0))) : (0))
00173 
00174 #define MCPWM_CNTCON_TCMCI_FE(tc,mci)   (((tc>=0)&&(tc<=2)&&(mci>=0)&&(mci<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<((6*tc)+(2*mci)+1))) : (0))
00175 
00176 #define MCPWM_CNTCON_CNTR(n)                    (((n>=0)&&(n<=2)) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<(29+n))) : (0))
00177 
00178 /*********************************************************************/
00182 #define MCPWM_DT(n,x)           ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)((x&0x3FF)<<(n*10))) : (0))
00183 
00184 /*********************************************************************/
00187 #define MCPWM_CP_A0             ((uint32_t)(1<<0))      
00188 #define MCPWM_CP_B0             ((uint32_t)(1<<1))      
00189 #define MCPWM_CP_A1             ((uint32_t)(1<<2))      
00190 #define MCPWM_CP_B1             ((uint32_t)(1<<3))      
00191 #define MCPWM_CP_A2             ((uint32_t)(1<<4))      
00192 #define MCPWM_CP_B2             ((uint32_t)(1<<5))      
00194 /*********************************************************************/
00198 #define MCPWM_CAPCLR_CAP(n)             ((n<=2) ? ((uint32_t)(1<<n)) : (0))
